module.name: Call Waiting
module.description: Provides an option to turn on/off call waiting
module.changelog: *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-13720 Make import and export less generic for bulkhandler *13.0.4* FREEPBX-11449 Sanatize bulk handler import *13.0.3* FREEPBX-11443 check to make sure setting exists before processing it *13.0.2* FREEPBX-11369 add bulk handler hook *13.0.1* FREEPBX-9564 UCP goes offline after changing settings *12.0.3* UCP work *12.0.2* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.1* UCP Module Addition
